LanguageData.AllowCrossFactionTooltip: This settings will allow colonists to play with animals of other factions.
LanguageData.AllowExoticPetsTooltip: Have a mod that allows you to have an insectoid, mechanoid or a fleshbeast monstrocity as a pet? Who am I to judge!? This setting allows these pets to be interacted with.
LanguageData.AllowHumanLikeTooltip: Have a mod that introduces human like pets? This allows mods whose animals are set as human like to be interacted with.
LanguageData.AllowNonColonistTooltip: Allows visitors from other factions to interact with your animals.
LanguageData.MustBeCuteTooltip: Only play with or walk nuzzling animals. WARNING: Do not turn this off unless your have a very large penned in area or you have a mod that allows you teach zoning rules to any animal.
